message.content:
cs.GR, cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with colorizing 3D furniture models and indoor scenes using image-guided mesh segmentation and Markov random field models. This involves computer graphics (cs.GR) techniques for 3D modeling and rendering, computer vision (cs.CV) techniques for image segmentation and colorization, multimedia (cs.MM) techniques for handling image and model databases, artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques for learning and recommending colorization schemes, and machine learning (cs.LG) techniques for training the models.
